column1: Baby Barnaby's////To start talking about the dishes
column2: almost every previous review mentioned about the green eggs therefore I ordered it. This plate was AMAZING. Anytime I eat eggs
column3: I usually have it with some sort of condiment
column4: but the green eggs here are so good that I don't have it with any condiments since I don't want to alter the flavor of the eggs. Secondly
column5: the apple chicken sausage that came with the platter was full of amazing flavor. I'm just impressed that everything that are included in the platter all tastes amazing!
